text: Ford Hiroshi Konno (born January 1, 1933) is a former Japaneseâ€“American competition swimmer. He was born in Honolulu, Hawaii. He won two gold medals and a silver medal at the 1952 Summer Olympics. Four years later, he won another silver medal at the 1956 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:American swimmers Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Olympic silver medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Hawaii Category:People from Honolulu
title: Ford Konno
